reminders.text_1: Set the time for before you go to sleep.

about.title: Our Goal
about.goal_text: To help people that suffer from depression, by providing short exercises that can be completed on your phone, at any time you choose.
about.contact_text:
If you have any suggestions,
or if you have suffered from depression before, and have any exercises that help you cope, please contact us at:

boundless.labs@gmail.com
